short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Google Chrome extension allows you to download Vimeo, Wistia and Facebook videos for better offline viewing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to download videos from Facebook, Vimeo and Wistia only in ONE CLICK
